collection:
This Privacy Policy explains how we
collect, use, and share information when you use our services.

Information Collection 

     * Personal Information When you register for StepWise, we collect information such as your name, email address, and contact details.
* Usage Data We collect data on how you interact with our services.
This includes pages visited, time spent on pages, and other similar information.
* Cookies and Similar Technologies We use cookies to enhance your experience, understand user activity, and improve the quality of our service.
* Analytics To better understand how our services are used and to enhance user experience, we analyze the data collected.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy explains how we
collect, use, and share information when you use our services.

Sharing of Information 

We do not sell your personal data.

Information may be shared with third-party
service providers for analytics purposes, but only to assist in improving
StepWise.
